alert.note: Alert for York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 1:33AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern York County through 200 AM CDT... At 133 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waco, or near York, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waco and Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 363 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
